fr.xephi.authme.util.expiring

Class TimedCounter<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.xephi.authme.util.expiring.ExpiringMap<K,Integer>
      • fr.xephi.authme.util.expiring.TimedCounter<K>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of the key

    public class TimedCounter<K>
extends ExpiringMap<K,Integer>
    Keeps a count per key which expires after a configurable amount of time.

    Once the expiration of an entry has been reached, the counter resets to 0. The counter returns 0 rather than null for any given key.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class fr.xephi.authme.util.expiring.ExpiringMap

        public void decrement(K key)
